name: Elf's Home
description:
Free building, day/night cycle, multiplayer and all of this in Elsf'sHome.

This game created on minecraft based mechanics. You can mining resources and build any constructions with the walls, walls door, roofs. And this game has a little plot.

This game developed for Tokyo IndieDev Game JAM and have bugs.

Game jam theme: PUMP UP + RUINS

Android platform added.

By DurmanGames.
